Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, is our mission today to track the special Corrupted?', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's right.", 3: '6', 4: 'We can just terminate it as well.', 5: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'But it surely is difficult to track something without its waveform signatures.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, does anything show up on the radar?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In that case... we might want to call in reinforcement during battle, depending on how powerful it is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, can you try to send out a reinforcement request in the area?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Ah... Sorry, were you talking to me?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Of course we were. You've been acting like this since we left the base. Is something wrong with your frame?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No, nothing's wrong. My frame is functioning properly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How about you go back to the base first?', 3: '28', 4: 'Are you sure?', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can still carry out the mission, so...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv's M.I.N.D. is in disarray. Data caching is exceeding the threshold!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Data caching?', 3: '36', 4: "We'll prioritize Liv first.", 5: '37'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Although we don't have to rest, our M.I.N.D.s still need to process excessive data regularly.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'A small amount of cache is fine, but in excess, it could throw the M.I.N.D. into disarray... Like fevers to humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Anyway, let's bring her back to the base for now.", 4: '1'}
